amendment.description: Amendment creates an independent study regarding indemnification for spaceflight participants including options, unintended consequences, and potential costs.
amendment.purpose: An amenmdment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 114-127 to create an independent study regarding indemnification for spaceflight participants including options, unintended consequences, and potential costs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
